This is KGB Archiver, an archiver that has execellent compression ratios. I will 

start uploading movies and games in .kgb format which has really small file size. I 

have heard of files that are compressed from 10 gb to 1 gb with this software. I 

don't know if that's true though. My next release will be Crysis 2 with NFS Carbon 

following soon after. Be patient, it takes almost a week of my computer constantly 

running to compress an 8 gb file such as Crysis 2. I will upload crysis as soon as it 

finishes compressing and i'll upload nfs carbon right after that. Feel free to make 

any requests in the comments and I'll upload them as within a week after seeing them.

Thanks,
AD
